body_html: Maybe this is a simpler way to put it: this file includes both THP.h and THCP.h (if built with CUDA) and THCP.h overrides the macros, so your macro definitions change in the middle of the file.
body_text: Maybe this is a simpler way to put it: this file includes both THP.h and THCP.h (if built with CUDA) and THCP.h overrides the macros, so your macro definitions change in the middle of the file.
body: Maybe this is a simpler way to put it: this file includes both THP.h and THCP.h (if built with CUDA) and THCP.h overrides the macros, so your macro definitions change in the middle of the file.
